user_instruction: 'Compose an email to get ConstructCo Solutions started on the new project. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Project Kick-Off – Next Steps with ConstructCo Solutions

Hi ConstructCo Team,

I hope you’re all doing well. I’m excited to officially launch our new project together and would like to outline the immediate next steps so we can hit the ground running.

Attached you’ll find:
• Draft project timeline (v1.0)  
• Initial materials & specifications package

To make sure everyone is aligned, could you please confirm your availability for a brief virtual kick-off meeting early next week? During that session we will:
1. Reconfirm project scope and success metrics  
2. Walk through the critical-path milestones on the timeline  
3. Identify near-term action items and owners  
4. Establish our ongoing communication cadence

In the meantime, please review the attached documents and feel free to send any preliminary questions or concerns. Your insights—especially around resource allocation, potential constraints, and value-engineering opportunities—will be invaluable as we refine the plan.

Thank you for your partnership. I’m confident your expertise will be instrumental in achieving a successful outcome, and I look forward to working closely with your team.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Title / Company]  
[Phone] | [Email]
